title: Mathematics Job Problem-Solving Mission to Enhance Information Literacy and Evaluation Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical concepts understanding and digital information retrieval experience
context.additional_context: Workplace-applicable math problem-solving activities through smartphone-based information utilization and team collaboration

learning_goals: Learners can analyze given data sources according to a three-level evaluation framework (Reliability, Objectivity, Relevance)
Learners can solve virtual workplace problems using mathematical evidence in a gamification environment
Learners can present information analysis results and incorporate peer feedback through peer assessment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
